thread.title: Oscar winner Alan Menken heads to India for Broadway musical
thread.title_full: Oscar winner Alan Menken heads to India for Broadway musical - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Oscar winner Alan Menken heads to India for Broadway musical
text:
Oscar-winning music composer-pianist *Alan Menken* will attend the staging of Broadway musical 'Beauty and the Beast' in Mumbai on October 21.*Alan Menken*
Menken, who has composed music for Hollywood films 'Beauty and The Beast' (1991), 'Enchanted' (2007) and 'Tangled' (2010), is flying in for the red carpet premiere which ... Â»
